attributes.action: Start teaching sign language in schools
attributes.additional_details: So many people every day suffer with hearing loss in all levels., some from birth and some develop later on. Learning BSL in school would be so much more beneficial to learn and it would help so many people.
attributes.background: I would like schools to introduce BSL into schools for all kids to be able to understand and learn the language of deaf people.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Add sign language on to the national schools curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599565

Provide funding for BSL classes for all school and college students and staff:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602411
